Detailed Description

A RayInersection objet is filled in by the pick methods in Group. RayIntersection stores a reference to the intersected Mesh or Sprite3D and information about the intersection point.

Member Function Documentation

float getDistance (  )  const

Retrieves the distance from the pick ray origin to the intersection point.

Node * getIntersected (  )  const

Retrieves the picked Mesh or Sprite 3D object.

float getNormalX (  )  const

Retrieves the X component of the surface normal at the intersection point.

float getNormalY (  )  const

Retrieves the Y component of the surface normal at the intersection point.

float getNormalZ (  )  const

Retrieves the Z component of the surface normal at the intersection point.

void getRay ( float *  ray  )  const

Retieves the origin (ox oy oz) and direction(dx dy dz) of the pick ray, inthat order.

int getSubmeshIndex (  )  const

Retrieves the index of the submesh where the intersection point is located within the intersected Mesh.

float getTextureS ( int  index  )  const

Retrives the S texture coordinate at the intersection point on the picked Mesh or Sprite3D.

float getTextureT ( int  index  )  const

Retrives the T texture coordinate at the intersection point on the picked Mesh or Sprite3D.

Print out information of this object, for debug only.
